file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 05-20-28-06 - CENTER FUSELAGE I - PASSENGER CABIN LH/RH SIDES - INTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL CENTER FUSELAGE I - PASSENGER CABIN LH/RH SIDES - INTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the visual inspection of center fuselage I - passenger cabin LH/RH sides for general condition. B. Related Zones: 231/232. C. Zone Boundaries: STA X = 4154.5 thru STA X = 7131.0. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY CENTER FUSELAGE I - PASSENGER ALL 05-20-28-200-801-A ♦ CABIN LH/RH SIDES - INTERNAL GENER- AL VISUAL INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 05-20-28 Page 1 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-20-28-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. CENTER FUSELAGE I - PASSENGER CABIN LH/RH SIDES - INTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives instructions to do SMRD Zonal Task 53-Z231-214-001-A00. (2) You must do the internal general visual inspection (GVI) of center fuselage I, at zones 231/232, within a touching distance of the items examined. (3) The function of the internal general visual inspection (GVI) is to find damage, failure, or irregular conditions that can be easily seen. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 12-23-00-600-801-A/300 - AMM TASK 25-23-01-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-23-01-000-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-23-01-400-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-23-01-400-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-23-02-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-23-02-000-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-23-02-400-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-23-02-400-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-30-01-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-30-01-000-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-30-01-000-803-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-30-01-000-804-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-30-01-000-805-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-30-01-000-806-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-30-01-400-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-30-01-400-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-30-01-400-803-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-30-01-400-804-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-30-01-400-805-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-30-01-400-806-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-30-02-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-30-02-400-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-801-A/400 - EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-20-28 Page 2 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (Continued) REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-802-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 231 231ALW Passenger cabin panel 231 231BLW Passenger cabin panel 241 241ALW Passenger cabin panel 241 241DLW Passenger cabin panel 242 242ARW Passenger cabin panel 242 242BRW Passenger cabin panel 242 242DRW Passenger cabin panel D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Standard Flashlight To make the inspection of the area easier E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE Center fuselage I - passenger cabin 1 Does the task LH/RH sides I. Preparation (Figure 601) (Figure 602) SUBTASK 841-008-A (1) Use table 601 to remove the passenger-cabin sidewall lining and skirting lining panels as applicable from your aircraft (AMM TASK 25-23-01-000-801-A/400) or (AMM TASK 25-23-01-000-802-A/400) and (AMM TASK 25-23-02-000-801-A/400) or (AMM TASK 25-23-02-000-802-A/400) (Figure 601, Figure 602). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-20-28 Page 3 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL Table 601 - PASSENGER-CABIN SIDEWALL LINING AND SKIRTING LINING PAN- ELS PANELS AIRCRAFT MODELS Sidewall Lining Skirting Lining 231ALW, 241ALW, and 231BLW, 241DLW, and EMB-145 ( ) 242ARW 242DRW EMB-135 ( ) 231ALW and 242BRW 231BLW and 242DRW (2) Remove the thermoacoustic insulation from center fuselage I to zones 231/232 (AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-801-A/400) or (AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-802-A/400) as applicable. (3) Remove the Forward Galley (AMM TASK 25-30-01-000-801-A/400, AMM TASK 25-30-01-000-802-A/400, AMM TASK 25-30-01-000-803-A/400, AMM TASK 25-30-01-000-804-A/400, AMM TASK 25-30-01-000-805-A/400, AMM TASK 25-30-01-000-806-A/400), as applicable. (4) Remove the Aft Galley (AMM TASK 25-30-02-000-801-A/400), if applicable. J. Internal General Visual Inspection (Figure 603) SUBTASK 212-008-A (1) Examine the interior of the zone for loose rivets, skin deformation, nicks, cracks, dents, sealant condition, scratches, gouges, creases, erosion, corrosion, painting condition, deteriorated protective treatment, and foreign objects. (2) Examine the interior of the fuselage skin panel at stringers, frames/bulkheads, and longitudinal and circumferential splices for loose rivets, cracks, skin deformation, painting, erosion, corrosion, and deteriorated protective treatment (Figure 603). (3) Examine drains for signs of corrosion. Also do a check for blockage and correct operation (AMM TASK 12-23-00-600-801-A/300). (4) Examine the interior of the zone for leakage on the skin, signs of friction, tension, broken strands, and signs of overheating. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-008-A (1) Install the Aft Galley (AMM TASK 25-30-02-400-801-A/400), if applicable. (2) Install the Forward Galley (AMM TASK 25-30-01-400-801-A/400, AMM TASK 25-30-01-400-802-A/400, AMM TASK 25-30-01-400-803-A/400, AMM TASK 25-30-01-400-804-A/400, AMM TASK 25-30-01-400-805-A/400, AMM TASK 25-30-01-400-806-A/400), as applicable. (3) Install the thermoacoustic insulation to zones 231/232 (AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-801- A/400) or (AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-802-A/400) as applicable. (4) Use table 601 to install the passenger-cabin sidewall lining and skirting lining panels as applicable to your aircraft (AMM TASK 25-23-01-400-801-A/400) or (AMM TASK 25-23-01-400-802-A/400) and (AMM TASK 25-23-02-400-801-A/400) or (AMM TASK 25-23-02-400-802-A/400).
